Sentencas: One of the critical fuel cell degradation phenomena is 'cell imbalance' in a series-connected stack, which can cause abnormal operation under a negative cell voltage and consequently rapid degradation by anode interface delamination.
Titulo: Delamination-resistant bi-layer electrolyte for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In a previous study, the effect of electrolyte composition on the electrochemical degradation of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) was investigated, and it was observed that a small amount of ceria (an electronic conducting material) prevents anode delamination under abnormal (negative voltage) operation.
Titulo: Delamination-resistant bi-layer electrolyte for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the open circuit voltage (OCV) was lowered as a result of reduction of ceria.
Titulo: Delamination-resistant bi-layer electrolyte for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the present study, bi-layer, YSZ (8 mol % yttria doped zirconia, a predominantly ionic conductor) at the cathode side and 8CYSZ (8 mol % ceria doped YSZ, a mixed ionic-electronic conductor) at the anode side were fabricated for anode-supported cells with a Pt probe embedded in each layer to estimate the internal oxygen chemical potential and tested under a negative voltage.
Titulo: Delamination-resistant bi-layer electrolyte for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results indicated that the OCV was close to the theoretical value (similar to that of a YSZ single layer cell) and no delamination was observed under negative voltage operation (similar to the case of an 8CYSZ single-layer cell).
Titulo: Delamination-resistant bi-layer electrolyte for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, the bi-layer-structured electrolyte (with locally increased electronic conduction at the anode side) is effective in preventing anode/electrolyte delamination as well as maintaining open circuit voltage.
Titulo: Delamination-resistant bi-layer electrolyte for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells
Delamination-resistant bi-layer electrolyte for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells
